title: Environment (Abstractions and Associated Impoundments) Act 2022 (No. 48 of
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Water Environment (Abstractions and
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Water Environment (Abstractions and 

Associated Impoundments) Act 2022 (Commencement) Order 2024.
text_norm: 1 order may cited water environment (abstractions associated impoundments) act 2022 (commencement) order 2024

title: Environment (Abstractions and Associated Impoundments) Act 2022 (No. 48 of
heading: 2. The 28th day of August 2024 is appointed as the day on which the Water
text_raw:
2. The 28th day of August 2024 is appointed as the day on which the Water 
Environment (Abstractions and Associated Impoundments) Act 2022 (No. 48 of 
2022) shall come into operation. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

28 August, 2024. 

DARRAGH O’BRIEN, 

Minister for Housing, Local Government and Heritage. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 30th August, 2024. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [417] 3
